comments.author: shasan
comments.created_time: April 24, 2023, 08:58:29 AMLast edit: April 24, 2023, 12:36:58 PM by shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Whir - Michael on April 24, 2023, 08:45:04 AM---Edited as you have bought copper membership:Quoted to show the image/images without clicking the link. As you are running a mixer you should hire an announcement designer and also you should buy a copper membership to show images. Hope you will take my opinion positively and take action accordingly.

comments.author: Sarah Azhari
comments.body: where is the letter of guarantee?, as my experience using many mixers, I usually receive that letter of guarantee when I mix my coin to prove if have a problem in near future. I can see also your sign address like another mixer did on the website, you must prove it under your site.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: It is great that you have bought Copper membership and now your image is showing perfectly. Would you like to answer the questions that arise from the community? So the sooner you will respond the better result you will be able to deserve. Also, you may run 2 campaigns for a good result1. Review the campaign and 2. Signature campaign.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Op you are welcome to the international forum where everyone gather to discuss bitcoin and other pressing issues. But if you keep your ANN thread only in the forum, many users not know your existence in the forum so you to follow the advice of shasan so that your company can also be well k own in the forum and recommendations will be given to others in offline and other social media to visit your site. Therefore, if wheneverÂ  you are ready, you can meet any manager who can handle the project with sincerity. There are lot of them in the forum. Just visit the service board, you will. See them there.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: QuoteIt is absolutely safe to use Whirsource: https://[banned mixer]/https://archive.ph/XxXfDSorry but I have to say this sounds a lot like something scammers would say. I have suspicion that many new mixers are either created by three letter agencies or by scammers with rinse and repeat schemes.Your website looks new but I have a strange feeling I saw it before, with the same pitch and mentioning of using Coinjoin.Have you been registered in bitcointalk forum before with different name/service?

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: OP I tried to go through the mixing process, but I am not seeing any letter of guarantee anywhere. So what happens if a dispute a rises in future? How does a user prove that they actually used your service to mix their coins or not if they don't have a signed message from an official address of yours?Also, there is something off about some blogs like this that you made - https://[banned mixer]/blog/top-bitcoin-tumblersI believe most of the information is not accurate. Also, which one is Bitcoin blender (If I recall well, I think Bitblender.io and Blender.io would use that name on their websites, but the mixers been defunct for some time) yet your blog was just made a month ago.

comments.author: Whir - Michael
comments.body: Quote from: dkbit98 on April 24, 2023, 09:58:21 PMQuoteIt is absolutely safe to use Whirsource: https://[banned mixer]/https://archive.ph/XxXfDSorry but I have to say this sounds a lot like something scammers would say. I have suspicion that many new mixers are either created by three letter agencies or by scammers with rinse and repeat schemes.Your website looks new but I have a strange feeling I saw it before, with the same pitch and mentioning of using Coinjoin.Have you been registered in bitcointalk forum before with different name/service?Nope, first time here and happy to offer our Bitcoin mixing service. To dispel any suspicions, read the latest posts in this thread 2023 List Bitcoin Mixers Bitcoin Tumblers Websites

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Whir - Michael on April 25, 2023, 12:56:33 PMNope, first time here and happy to offer our Bitcoin mixing service. To dispel any suspicions, read the latest posts in this thread 2023 List Bitcoin Mixers Bitcoin Tumblers Websites Sorry, but how exactly does the discussion you point to dispel doubts? I would say that it only confirms the suspicions of other members as well.After the closing of ChipMixer, new similar services are opened almost every day. I agree with most of what has been said here that you should be extra careful. You have to do a lot more to gain positive trust.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: Whir - Michael on April 25, 2023, 12:56:33 PMNope, first time here and happy to offer our Bitcoin mixing service. To dispel any suspicions, read the latest posts in this thread 2023 List Bitcoin Mixers Bitcoin Tumblers Websites OK, but I don't understand what exactly should I see in that thread that is so special to dispel all my suspicions...If you are using regular Coinjoin than I see no reason for making any risk when I can use decentralized Coinjoin or Joinmarket solutions with available open source wallets.Maybe you can explain what advantages you are offering compared to other or create some review campaign in forum.

If you're still sceptical, just give it a try, it's simple

comments.author: nioctib_100
comments.body: The twitter account (https://twitter.com/btcwhir) has been around and active since May 2022. Never seen this mentioned on Bitcointalk before, although the site's web design is truly pretty professional, something better than any other mixer I've seen before. Where were you all getting users before, just Twitter?
